Html:
I'm guessing you guys are using 7zip to compress the download. I tried unzipping it using my usual zip app - Tugzip and it basically killed the unzipper. I could see the files listed but when I tried to extract it maxed out CPU and basically hung the PC until I killed the process. After a bit of tinkering I tried 7zip and it unzipped just fine.

I guess I'm just saying can you put something on the download page because it's probably going to cause grief for other people too.

On a better note, looking forward to tinkering with spec and gear now the new Rawr is out. Thanks for the dedication in releasing a new version so quick.
We're just using the standard built-in windows explorer zip.

Weird, the new release (2.0.2) is killing Tugzip as well. I never had any problems prior to the 2.xx releases.

Well I suppose I need something to force me to change to 7zip anyway.
